name: Forza Horizon
summary:
Forza Horizon, an action racing game set in Colorado, is a departure from previous titles in the Forza Motorsport franchise.

Set against the backdrop of a music festival in Colorado, Forza Horizon is an "open world automotive playground" that offers the authenticity and incredible vehicles you've come to expect from a Forza game, along with exciting racing action.

A variety of specialty events and race modes, plus a "dynamic day/night cycle", take advantage of the diverse, destructible Colorado terrain. While realistic driving simulators often penalize drivers for reckless or poor car-handling, Horizon rewards points for style and havoc -- complete with multipliers in true arcade fashion with a true simulator feel.
